roleset.name: physically feel or handle
roleset.note: PALPATE-V NOTES: Based on data in Clinical Notes corpus (from palpate.01-v predicate notes)
PALPATION-N NOTES: Based on data in Clinical Notes corpus (from palpation.01-n predicate notes)

example.name: palpate-v: Both args
example.text: The doctor palpated the area and did not find any fractures.

example.name: palpation-n: Both args
example.text: Upon the doctor's palpation of the patient's liver, she discovered a large mass.

roleset.name: able to be felt by palpation
roleset.note: PALPABLE-J NOTES: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Comparison to palpate.01. No Vn or Fn classes. Framed by Katie (from palpable.01-j)

example.name: palpable-j: With loc
example.text: The balloon-expandable stent is palpable above the ligament.
